    <Button onClick={handleClose}>\n                Close\n              </Button>\n            </DialogFooter>\n          </>\n        )\n\n      case 'failed':\n        return (\n          <>\n            <DialogHeader>\n              <DialogTitle className=\"flex items-center gap-2\">\n                <XCircle className=\"h-5 w-5 text-red-500\" />\n                Reindex Failed\n       </>\n        )\n\n      default: // 'idle' or 'confirming'\n        return (\n          <>\n            <DialogHeader>\n              <DialogTitle className=\"flex items-center gap-2\">\n                <AlertTriangle className=\"h-5 w-5 text-yellow-500\" />\n                Confirm CGR Re-index\n              </DialogTitle>\n              <DialogDescription>\n                Are you sure you null\n      state.cachedCommit = action.payload.cachedCommit ?? null\n      state.currentCommit = action.payload.currentCommit ?? null\n      state.lastChecked = new Date().toISOString()\n    },\n\n    // Modal controls\n    openConfirmModal(state) {\n      state.showConfirmModal = true\n    },\n    closeConfirmModal(state) {\n      state.showConfirmModal = false\n    },\n\n    // Reindex operation\n    reindexStart(state) {\n      state.reindexStatus = 'running'\n      state.reindexStartTime = new Date().toISOString()\n      state.reindexError = null\n      state.showConfirmModal = false\n    },\n    reindexSuccess(state) {\n      state.reindexStatus = 'completed'\n    },\n    reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {\n      state.reindexStatus = 'failed'\n      state.reindexError = action.payload\n    },\n    reindexReset(state) {\n      state.reindexStatus = 'idle'\n      state.reindexStartTime = null\n      state.reindexError = null\n    },\n  },\n})\n\nexport const {\n  updateCacheStatus,\n  openConfirmModal,\n  closeConfirmModal,\n  reindexStart,\n  reindexSuccess,\n  reindexFailure,\n  reindexReset,\n} = cgrSlice.actions\n\nexport default cgrSlice.reducer\n"
}

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer

       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     ```typescript
     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},

         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},

       },

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     ```typescript
     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer

       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',

         reindexSuccess(state) {...},

       reindexError: null,

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({

       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,

       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({

       },

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```

     import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

     export type CGRStatus = 'fresh' | 'stale' | 'diverged' | 'no_cache' | 'unknown'
     export type ReindexStatus = 'idle' | 'confirming' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed'

     interface CGRState {
       cacheStatus: CGRStatus
       commitsBehind: number | null
       cachedCommit: string | null
       currentCommit: string | null
       lastChecked: string | null
       reindexStatus: ReindexStatus
       reindexStartTime: string | null
       reindexError: string | null
       showConfirmModal: boolean
     }

     const initialState: CGRState = {
       cacheStatus: 'unknown',
       commitsBehind: null,
       cachedCommit: null,
       currentCommit: null,
       lastChecked: null,
       reindexStatus: 'idle',
       reindexStartTime: null,
       reindexError: null,
       showConfirmModal: false,
     }

     const cgrSlice = createSlice({
       name: 'cgr',
       initialState,
       reducers: {
         updateCacheStatus(state, action: PayloadAction<{...}>) {...},
         openConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = true },
         closeConfirmModal(state) { state.showConfirmModal = false },
         reindexStart(state) {...},
         reindexSuccess(state) {...},
         reindexFailure(state, action: PayloadAction<string>) {...},
         reindexReset(state) {...},
       },
     })

     export const { updateCacheStatus, openConfirmModal, closeConfirmModal, reindexStart, reindexSuccess, reindexFailure, reindexReset } = cgrSlice.actions
     export default cgrSlice.reducer
     ```
